message.content: First, we need to know what the catch-phrase used to attack John Kerry in 2004 was. Next, we need to investigate whether Rand Paul has been accused of using this catch-phrase to attack Kerry. We can do a quick internet search and find multiple sources that confirm that Rand Paul has used the "flip-flop" accusation against Kerry during his political career. Therefore, the answer is (A) yes, Rand Paul is guilty of using the catch-phrase used to attack John Kerry in 2004.
